definitions.definition: To produce flames; to burn with a flame or blaze.
To burst forth like flame; to break out in violence of passion; to be kindled with zeal or ardour.
To post a destructively critical or abusive message (to somebody).
examples: I flamed him for spamming in my favourite newsgroup.

main_definition: To produce flames; to burn with a flame or blaze.
secondary_definitions: To burst forth like flame; to break out in violence of passion; to be kindled with zeal or ardour.
( Internet , ambitransitive ) To post a destructively critical or abusive message (to somebody).
